description: Developed the User Interface for a 3D Car Configurator Application using React components,enhancing user interaction.
Designed workflows for UI and 3D Model interactions, improving response times by 30% and  ensuring real-time model updates
Implemented secure user authentication and authorization with JWT, including data hashing for secure storage.
Optimized server-side logic with asynchronous APIs, boosting application responsiveness by 20%.
Collaborated with cross-functional team collaborations to integrate UI with server-side logic,  achieving a 40% improvement in data retrieval speed and enhancing user experience
Designed and implemented MongoDB database schemas to ensure optimal performance and data integrity for extensive data sets
